mean_cn: n. 即兴（诗人，表演者等）
mean_en: a person who makes or do something using whatever he/she has or without having planned it in advance.
sentence: He's a good improviser, so he can always make up new songs when he plays.
sentence_trans: 他是个很好的即兴创作者，所以他总是能在表演时作出新歌。
word_etyma: im未 ＋ pro提前 ＋ vis看 ＋ er表示做某事的人 → 未能提前预见，即兴 → improviser即兴诗人；即席演奏者；即兴创作者
